mapper.select: select * from COURSE where SUBJECT_ID = #{SUBJECT_ID} and TEACHER_ID = #{TEACHER_ID} and CLASS_ID = #{CLASS_ID} and SEMESTER = #{SEMESTER}

select C.COURSE_ID, CL.CLASS_ID, CL.CLASS_NAME, S.SUBJECT_NAME, C.SEMESTER from COURSE C, SUBJECT S, CLASS CL where C.TEACHER_ID = #{TEACHER_ID} AND S.SUBJECT_ID = C.SUBJECT_ID AND C.CLASS_ID = CL.CLASS_ID

select C.COURSE_ID, CL.CLASS_NAME, S.SUBJECT_NAME, C.SEMESTER from COURSE C, SUBJECT S, CLASS CL, STUDENT ST where ST.USER_ID = #{STUDENT_ID} AND S.SUBJECT_ID = C.SUBJECT_ID AND C.CLASS_ID = CL.CLASS_ID AND ST.CLASS_ID = C.CLASS_ID
